content.content: Hi community, We wanted to provide an update you on 3 developments this week    Testnet launch We are launching Spark Protocol testnet! You’ll be able to use faucets to supply and borrow all the supported assets to test all the features. https://app.sparkprotocol.io   Governance Vote for PE support The community has voted in support to allow Protocol Engineering to support Phoenix Labs in developing Spark Protocol. Thank you for the support! https://vote.makerdao.com/polling/QmTiALcZ https://vote.makerdao.com/polling/QmRZAMq2   Aave Snapshot vote The Snapshot vote has gone up, asking the Aave community how they would prefer to have the retroactive payment for the open-source development of the Aave V3 codebase. https://snapshot.org/#/aave.eth/proposal/0x15a031fa5f848aac269214a7cda2fed314590ab0c935b6879e4bf7fb9d87cc2c   Next up will be the governance vote to approve the support and initial funding for Phoenix Labs and Spark Protocol in the March Governance Cycle. Pending a successful vote, we are still on track to launch the protocol in April.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is providing an update on the Spark Protocol, including the launch of the testnet, a governance vote for PE support, and an Aave Snapshot vote. The post explains the developments and provides links for more information. A 3rd party has not given any feedback or criticism on the proposal, but has asked questions and may review the proposal in the future.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
